content: उपशमः {@--1@} Becoming quiet, assuagement, pacification; कुतोऽस्या उपशमः <ls>Ve. 3</ls>; मन्युर्दुःसह एष यात्युपशमं नो सांत्ववादैः स्फुटं <ls>Amaru. 5</ls>; cessation, stopping, extinction. {@--2@} Relaxation, intermission. {@--3@} Tranquility, calmness, patience; ज्ञानस्योपशमः <ls>Bh. 2. 82.</ls> {@--4@} Control or restraint of the senses.
